entry.title: Cadbury Snack Shortcake UK - 36 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cadbury UK
Type: Chocolate
Price: 56.00

Classic British Chocolate Bars 

Squares of shortcake biscuit that are smothered in Milk Chocolate makes the Snack Shortcake an astounding British Chocolate Bar. Great with your afternoon coffee, or tea, if you really want to keep things British. This Bar falls "short" of nothing, a crisp bite of biscuit and milk chocolate, is pure perfection! A must have Chocolate Bar in your British Candy section.

Your customers will demand that these delicious British chocolate bars are in your candy section!

Ingredients:

WHEAT flour (with added calcium, iron, niacin and thiamin), sugar, vegetable fats (palm, sal, shea), MILK, cocoa butter, cocoa mass, dextrose, rapeseed oil, dried whey (from MILK), molasses, partially inverted sugar syrup, salt, emulsifiers (SOYA lecithin, E476), raising agents (ammonium bicarbonate, sodium bicarbonate), flavourings.
MAY CONTAIN NUTS.

43 g Bars | 36 Count Box

Fresh British Candy Shipped Fast at Wholesale Prices!

entry.title: Waterbridge Funstix Candies - 15 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waterbridge
Type: Candy
Price: 37.50

British Candy

Waterbridge is delighted to introduce these colourful, fun, fruit flavoured Funstix. Enjoy these 3 mouth-watering flavours that will undoubtedly make you want more… Strawberry: a double burst of strawberry - chewy strawberry Funstix surrounds a soft fruity centre. Cherry: a reverse cherry explosion - soft cherry fondant coats a chewy cherry centre. Fruit: a mix fruit fiesta - a chewy fruit Funstix surrounds a soft fruity centre. Twist them, tie them or mix them together for a burst of fun.

200 g Pouches | 15 Count 

Ingredients: Sugar/Glucose-Fructose, Water, Wheat Flour, Corn Starch, Dextrose, Citric Acid, Malic Acid, Lactic Acid, Palm Oil, Gelatin, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Lactate, Artificial Flavour, Salt, Mono & Diglycerides, Potassium Sorbate, Colour, Beeswax, Carnauba Wax, Shellac. 

Contains Wheat. May Contain Milk, Soya, and Tree Nuts.
